product_name: The North Face Glacier Full-Zip Hoodie - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The North Face Glacier Full-Zip hoodie makes toddlers look effortlessly cool and irresistably cute while keeping them warm and cozy. Lightweight polyester fleece is durable and pill-resistant. 2 front hand pockets; full-length zipper.
